text: Ara abasya'i amara apanara purbe aneka rasula pathiyechi. Amara tadera karo karo kahini apanara kache bibrta karechi ebam karo karo kahini apanara kache bibrta karini. Ara allahara anumati chara kono nidarsana niye asa kono rasulera kaja naya. Atahpara yakhana allahara adesa asabe takhana n'yayasangatabhabe phayasala haye yabe. Ara takhana batilapanthira ksatigrasta habe
